Introducing our Mixologist

Ivan Priemkin

Ladies and gentlemen, it's time to meet our Mixologist, the charming and mysterious Ivan Priemkin.

Childhood

Hailing from a cozy village nestled among the majestic peaks of the Caucasian mountains, Ivan developed a deep love and appreciation for nature during his numerous hikes. His passion for picking mushrooms, berries, and herbs instilled in him a refined palate and a discerning attitude toward food and drinks.

Outstanding Talent

Homemade jams, juices, kombuchas -
Ivan is a true connoisseur.

master of mixology

After honing his skills in Moscow's famous bars, Ivan became a true master of mixology. Over the years, he attended hundreds of masterclasses, became a specialist in the coffee industry, and represented his country in a cocktail competition in Barcelona, where he emerged victorious.

Personal skills

Ivan's main qualities are his attention to ingredients, his impeccable sense of taste, and his passion for crafting the perfect drink.

Convince yourself

So, without further ado, it's your turn to experience the best - courtesy of Mr. Priemkin.
